author: Home RenoVision DIY
description:
This is one of the reasons why I choose a hawk over a pan for drywall work! In this short I'll show you how to use a hawk and why the Hawk Mate attachment makes mudding faster and easier. You never have to step off your ladder to grab your knife again. 
#affiliate #lowespartner
title: THIS is Why You Should Always Use a Hawk When You Drywall
